name.namePart: RV Investigator Voyage IN2020_V01 Seabird Observations, Broken Ridge region, Indian Ocean (2020)

collection.description: A team of 4 observers recorded 446 incidental seabird and cetacean sightings from Perth, Western Australia and return on the RV Investigator voyage IN2020_V01. The bulk of the observations is at Broken Ridge on the edge of the Kerguelen Plateau. Voyage details (metadata, projects, other datasets either online or as downloads, publications and reports, events, maps etc) can be accessed at https://www.marine.csiro.au/data/trawler/surveydetails.cfm?survey=IN2020V01 If thi s data has been used in any products, please acknowledge with the following: We acknowledge the use of the CSIRO Marine National Facility (https://ror.org/01mae9353) in undertaking this research.

citationInfo.fullCitation: Sime T (2023): RV Investigator Voyage IN2020_V01 Seabird Observations, Broken Ridge region, Indian Ocean (2020). v1.5.
